channel.title: A Command Question
channel.description:
Considering the Server Development/Help Forum is down, I will ask this here.
How do I use a command on somebody else?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2007, 02:15:52 PM[/size][hr]No one's even looking here. o.o[br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2007, 02:21:13 PM[/size][hr]God you people only answer the easy answers, huh?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2007, 04:48:34 PM[/size][hr]...And I stick to my theory.

item.title: A Command Question
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

Well, atleast something worked. It gave you the items, and I’m not a master either, but I tried.

Read full topic

item.title: A Command Question
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“The Mentor, post:6, topic:81740”]I’m not sure that is this correct, but it should be something like this.

if (command.startsWith("give")) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; addItem(xxxx, x); addItem(xxxx, x); p.sendMessage("You have been praised by "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesn't exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to give stuff"); } } Just please if this isn’t correct don’t flame me or anything.[/quote]When I do that… it always catches exception e… and sometimes it gives ME the items…

Read full topic

item.title: A Command Question
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

I’m not sure that is this correct, but it should be something like this.

if (command.startsWith("give")) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; addItem(xxxx, x); addItem(xxxx, x); p.sendMessage("You have been praised by "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesn't exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to give stuff"); } } Just please if this isn’t correct don’t flame me or anything.

Read full topic

item.title: A Command Question
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“soalreaver, post:4, topic:81740”]ok this… medium hard post…eer yeh…

if u dont know how to use a command on sum 1’s server then wdf are u gibbering about… and here…

Step 1
Try the command ::help
Step 2
try the command ::Saveme
or step 3
try ::commandmenu
step 4
Try ::(random commands)
step 5
How the hell dont u know that…[/quote]I’m talking about like making it so that I use ::give (player name) and give them an item. That IS sort of medium hard. -.-[br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2007, 05:19:54 PM[/size][hr]And FYI, I’m trying to figure this out on my OWN Server.

Still need help peeples.

Read full topic

item.title: A Command Question
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

ok this… medium hard post…eer yeh…

if u dont know how to use a command on sum 1’s server then wdf are u gibbering about… and here…

Step 1
Try the command ::help
Step 2
try the command ::Saveme
or step 3
try ::commandmenu
step 4
Try ::(random commands)
step 5
How the hell dont u know that…

item.title: A Command Question
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“soalreaver, post:2, topic:81740”]TRY NOT QUAD POSTING THEN MABEY PPL WOULD HELP!!![/quote]cough wrong cough If I didn’t quad post nobody would notice it, so you are quite wrong. See, people who barely know Java try to help people and guess what, they can’t! So, they go to one of my posts and see I want some semi-medium help and they say, “Oh, this is way too hard for me!” and leave it.

Read full topic
